indicator.name: SHARE OF OPERATIONAL EQUIPMENT
indicator.formula: (total number equipment with STATUS=Operational) / (total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance))

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL') and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: QUANTITY OF EQUIPMENT FOR DISPOSAL
indicator.formula: total number of equipment with status For disposal

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where equ.currentStatus='FORDISPOSAL' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: QUANTITY OF EQUIPMENT INSTOCK
indicator.formula: total number of equipment with status IN STOCK

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where equ.currentStatus='INSTOCK' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: DEGREE OF EQUIPMENT STANDARDIZATION
indicator.formula: (max (no. of equipments of type 1 from one manufacturer)+max(no. of equipments of type 2 from one manufacturer)+....) / (Total no. of equipments at the facility)

indicator.name: SHARE OF EQUIPMENT DONATED
indicator.formula: (total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance) and PURCHASER = (Donor))/(total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance))

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL') and equ.purchaser='BYDONOR' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL') and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: SHARE OF EQUIPMENT THAT IS OBSOLETE
indicator.formula: (total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance) and OBSELETE BOX CHECKED)/(total number equipment with STATUS = (Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance))

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL') and equ.obsolete='1' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL') and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: SHARE OF EQUIPMENT UNDER ACTIVE WARRANTY OR UNDER ACTIVE SERVICE PROVIDER CONTRACT
indicator.formula: (total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance) and (Current Date – Warranty Start Date) less than (Warranty period)) or (Current Date – Contract Start Date) less than (Contract period))(/total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance))

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='INSTOCK') and ((DATEDIFF(:currentDate,equ.warranty.startDate)lessthan(equ.warrantyPeriod.numberOfMonths)*30) or (DATEDIFF(:currentDate,equ.serviceContractStartDate)lessthan(equ.serviceContractPeriod.numberOfMonths)*30) and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier)

select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='INSTOCK') and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: SHARE OF EQUIPMENT WITH LIFE TIME EXPIRING IN LESS THAN 2 YEARS
indicator.formula: (total number equipment with STATUS=(Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance) and (Current Date – date of first inventory updation/DATE OF PURCHASE) >(Expected life time – 2years)/(total number equipment with STATUS = (Operational; Partially operational, Under maintenance))

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='INSTOCK') and (((equ.expectedLifeTime.numberOfMonths-24)*30)lessthan(DATEDIFF(:currentDate,equ.purchaseDate))) and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='INSTOCK') and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: Share of equipments for which a work order was generated
indicator.formula: Total number of equipments for which work order was generated / total number of equipment with status ={Operational, Partially operational,Under maintenance}

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select equ.code from Equipment equ where equ.id in(select wo.equipment.id from WorkOrder wo) and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier
TOTAL_NUMBER_EQUIPEMENTS

indicator.name: DEGREE OF CORRECTIVE MAINTENANC EEXECUTION ACCORDING TO BENCHMARK
indicator.formula: Total no. of work orders with status changed from open at facility or open at MM to Closed fixed/ total no. of work orders generated in a given time frame (time frame to be decided by the user)

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select wo.id from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.currentStatus='CLOSEDFIXED' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier
TOTAL_NUMBER_WORK_ORDERS

indicator.name: SHARE OF WORK ORDERS WITNESSING REINCIDENCE IN A PERIOD OF TIME (USER DEFINED)
indicator.formula: Total no. of work orders witnessing re-incidence in a given time frame/total no. Of work orders in that time frame

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select wo.id from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.failureReason='RE-INCIDENCE' or wo.failureReason='MISUSE' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier
TOTAL_NUMBER_WORK_ORDERS

indicator.name: COST EFFECTIVENESS OF CORRECTIVE_MAINTENANCE
indicator.formula: Average equipments (cumulative cost of corrective maintenance (cost of all work orders in equipment’s history) for an equipment / cost of the equipment)

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select sum(wo.estimatedCost) from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier
select sum(equ.purchaseCost) from Equipment equ where equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: SHARE OF WORK ORDERS ESCALETED TO MMC
indicator.formula: Total work orders with status change from open at facility to :open at MMC / total work orders

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select wo.id from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.currentStatus='OPENATMMC' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier
TOTAL_NUMBER_WORK_ORDERS

indicator.name: AVERAGE TIME TO FIX EQUIPMENT
indicator.formula: Average all work orders (Time taken for work order status to change from “open at facility” to “closed fixed”)

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select avg(wo.travelTime.numberOfMinutes) from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.currentStatus='CLOSEDFIXED' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

indicator.name: AVERAGE TIME TO FIX EQUIPMENT BY DH TECHNICIAN
indicator.formula: Average time taken for those work orders to close which were never escalated to the MMC, i.e. Status change from open at facility to closed fixed without there being an intermediate open at MMC

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select avg(wo.travelTime.numberOfMinutes) from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.id not in(select wos.workOrder.id from WorkOrderStatus wos where wos.status='OPENATMMC') and wo.currentStatus='CLOSEDFIXED' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier"

indicator.name: AVERAGE TIME TO FIX EQUIPMENT BY MMC
indicator.formula: Average time for work orders to change status from “open at MMC” to “closed fixed”

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select avg(wo.travelTime.numberOfMinutes) from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.id in(select wos.workOrder.id from WorkOrderStatus wos where wos.status='OPENATMMC') and wo.currentStatus='CLOSEDFIXED' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier"

indicator.name: SHARE OF WORK ORDERS REQUIRING NEW SPARE PARTS
indicator.formula: Number of work orders using spare parts before getting closed / total number of work orders

scriptFormula.excutableScript: waitting okkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk
TOTAL_NUMBER_WORK_ORDERS

indicator.name: SHARE OF PROBLEMS CAUSED BY MISUSE
indicator.formula: number of work orders with misuse as reason of equipment failure / total number of work orders generated

scriptFormula.excutableScript: select wo.id from WorkOrder wo join wo.equipment as equ where wo.failureReason='MISUSE' and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier
TOTAL_NUMBER_WORK_ORDERS

indicator.name: COST EFFECTIVENESS OF PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE
indicator.formula: Average equipments (cumulative cost of preventive maintenance maintenance for an equipment/cost of the equipment)
indicator.scriptFormula: Average equipments (cumulative cost of preventive maintenance maintenance for an equipment/cost of the equipment)

indicator.name: Degree of execution of preventive maintenance
indicator.formula: Number of preventive maintenance deadlines adhered to/total number of preventive maintenance deadlines

indicator.name: Share of maintenance executed at the facility
indicator.formula: Number of PM deadlines adhered to at the facility/Total number of PM deadlines

indicator.name: DEVIATION AGAINST SCHEDULED DATE
indicator.formula: Average deviation from scheduled date

indicator.name: NUMBER OF TYPES OF SPARE PARTS ABOUT TO BE DISCONTINUED IN A YEAR
indicator.formula: Total number of types of spare parts with their discontinuation date within a year;

indicator.name: NUMBER OF TYPES OF SPARE PARTS ABOUT TO STOCK OUT IN A GIVEN TIME PERIOD
indicator.formula: Formula for this case will be : No. Of spare part types at a facility with stock out time less than a certain threshold (to be defined by the administrator) / total number of spare part types at the facility

indicator.name: NUMBER OF TYPES OF SPARE PARTS WITH STOCK MORE THAN A GIVEN TIME PERIOD
indicator.formula: Formula for this case will be : No. Of spare part types at a facility with stock out time more than a certain threshold (to be defined by the administrator) / total number of spare part types at the facility

indicator.name: AVERAGE STOCK TIME
indicator.formula: (Number of spare parts of type 1 x use rate of spare part of type 1+number of spare part of type 2 x use rate of spare part of type 2.....) / (Total number of spare parts of all types)

indicator.name: AVERAGE TIME BETWEEN REQUEST AND ARRIVAL OF SPARE PARTS
indicator.formula: Average time for status change from pending order to in stock

indicator.name: AVERAGE NUMBER OF EQUIPMENT PER FACILITY
indicator.formula: Average number of equipments per facility – District hospital and health centre; different criteria to be defined for the two types of facilities

scriptFormula.excutableScript: TOTAL_NUMBER_FACILITIES

indicator.name: SHARE OF FACILITIES WITH NUMBER OF INVENTORY STATUS CHANGES LESS THAN 10 IN A YEAR
indicator.formula: Number of facilities with less than 10 inventory status changes / total number of facilities

indicator.name: SHARE OF FACILITIES WITH NUMBER OF WORK ORDERS LESS THAN 10 IN A YEAR
indicator.formula: Share of facilities with less than 10 work orders in a year

indicator.name: AVERAGE PERCENTAGE OF EQUIPMENT_S PER FACILITY HAVING A PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE PLAN
indicator.formula: Average percentage of equipments per facility having a preventive maintenance plan

indicator.name: SHARE OF FACILITIES WITH NO PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE PLAN FOR MORE THAN 10% OF THE EQUIPMENT
indicator.formula: Number of facilities with no preventive maintenance plan for more than 10 % of the equipments / Total no. Of facilities

indicator.name: SHARE OF WAREHOUSES WITH NUMBER OF SPARE PART INVENTORY STATUS CHANGES LESS THAN 20 IN A MONTH
indicator.formula: Number of warehouses with less than 20 spare part inventory status changes in a month / Total no. Of warehouses
